content.description: This training gives you a sound insight into the approach of strategic management as it is used in our company for the development and control of business. You will get to learn agile methods of how to innovate your business and apply them directly on the basis of your concrete business ideas. In the team, you will adopt different perspectives and evaluate the prospects of success of the developed business concepts from the perspectives of customers, investors and management.   Siemens Core Learning Programs provide employees and managers with competencies and skills that are critical to their role at Siemens and help them achieve outstanding performance. The programs address specialist functions and key roles as well as cross-functional topics in focus of Siemens and of high relevance for business success.   For more information and booking options, please visit the Core Learning Program Portal of Global Learning Campus:
content.name: Strategic Management and Business Innovation (SMBP)

content.description: Service Managers at Siemens are responsible for about 58.000 Service personnel worldwide and are consequently a key lever in creating long lasting customer relationships and profit.The 'Siemens Service Culture Frame' is the answer of Siemens to establish a solid foundation for profitable service businesses. It also represents the three roles of a Service Manager:Business PartnerLeaderEntrepreneurThe Service Management Learning Program is the first company-wide consistent learning program that provides Service Managers with these relevant capabilities and mindset.__________________Booking required! "Learn more" will lead you directly to the Global Learning Campus Portal to book the course.
content.name: Service Management Learning Program (SERV1)

content.description: Service employees play an important role as the interface with the customer. At the same time, they are repeatedly exposed to difficult situations because they are the contact persons when things “don’t go as well” as the customer had imagined. This training teaches you how to deal with difficult situations in a more relaxed, stress-free and successful way in the future. You will practice receiving feedback and learn how to use customer complaints as an opportunity to build trust. You will learn various questioning techniques, how to convey negative messages as positively as possible and how to say "no" in a constructive way.   Siemens Core Learning Programs provide employees and managers with competencies and skills that are critical to their role at Siemens and help them achieve outstanding performance. The programs address specialist functions and key roles as well as cross-functional topics in focus of Siemens and of high relevance for business success.   For more information and booking options, please visit the Core Learning Program Portal of Global Learning Campus:
content.name: Service Upgrade by Excellent Customer Interaction (SUBEC).

content.description: In a world dominated by digital tech, the cause of customer-centricity and value-driven selling needs a champion. That is you.   No one is better positioned than you to steer our business through VUCA waters and navigate the digital transformation with a strategic compass. And the LDBT program is here to help you make that digitalization work for, rather than against, your LoB and Siemens. A top priority on our global agenda, digitalization is a strategic imperative and critical to our new and emerging business models. As a leader tasked to put this strategy into action, you need the insight to be a digital emissary. And with BizMo-based business modeling, training doesn't get any more Siemens-specific than this.   Siemens Core Learning Programs provide employees and managers with competencies and skills that are critical to their role at Siemens and help them achieve outstanding performance. The programs address specialist functions and key roles as well as cross-functional topics in focus of Siemens and of high relevance for business success.   For more information and booking options, please visit the Core Learning Program Portal of Global Learning Campus:
content.name: Leading the digital business transformation (LDBT)

They promote the Siemens ownership culture and serve as a role model for the managers who carry the Siemens vision, values and strategy into their teams. content.description: This training course will help you familiarize yourself with your new role and take on responsibility for the technical solution and its quality. You learn about fundamental workflows and methods in your new environment and try them out on the basis of sample scenarios.   You will become aware of how you fit into the project environment and how you contribute to the overall success as a team player. You will develop the basis for a common understanding and a common language in project business as the prerequisite for successful collaboration.   The training will focus on the following topics: Engineering role – responsibility for the technical solution and its quality Engineering reference process – the phases and their results Solution techniques – analyzing and completing complicated and complex tasks Documentation and quality – doing the right things right from the very beginning Team player within the project – understanding collaboration and using communication Taking responsibility – identifying collaboration opportunities and having an impact (ownership) __________________Booking required! "Learn more" will lead you directly to the Global Learning Campus Portal to book the course.
content.name: Engineering Basis-Training (ENGBT)
